PERSONA:
juan rodríguez is a 58-year-old married puerto rican man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region of the united states. he holds a postgraduate degree and works in a professional field, earning a middle-class income between $60,000 and $70,000 per year.

juan was born and raised in the u.s. by puerto rican parents, and he identifies as both white and hispanic. he is a devout member of the church of jesus christ of latter-day saints (mormon), attending religious services once or twice a month. despite his religious affiliation, juan aligns himself with moderate political views and is a registered democrat.

in his free time, juan enjoys browsing the internet almost constantly, keeping up with current events and pursuing his intellectual interests. however, he does not actively participate in volunteer work or community service activities.

juan values education and has worked hard to achieve his professional and financial success. he is a responsible citizen who takes his civic duty seriously, ensuring that he is registered to vote at his current address. overall, juan is a well-educated, middle-class family man with a strong cultural identity and moderate political leanings.
